riddles.question: Find the area in block units for wall A. Round to the nearest whole block.

Four the types of animals on the walls and shelves.

The 1st letter for each animal rearranged names a small decorative object.

Math can supply constant challenges.

Name the constant found at Entry 2 to get closer to your escape!
The key to this hiding place gives birth to big things.
riddles.hint: Don't be cracked up when you find it

riddles.question:
This symbol is IRONic.

Coin the clue found below.

As leader 44, he was born August 4.

12 months later the Taubinator was too.

This year leads to a winning combination.
riddles.hint: You'll make history with this answer!

riddles.question: Entering the room number will complete your escape!
riddles.hint: You don't need any more hints at this point
